## Description

Please include a summary of the changes and which failure entries or patterns are being added/modified.

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of Change

- [ ] New failure entry
- [ ] New failure pattern
- [ ] Automation / Workflow improvement
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Bug fix (validation script, etc.)

## Quality Checklist

- [ ] **Data Model:** All new entries follow the required YAML format.
- [ ] **Agent Layer:** `agent/entries.ndjson` or `agent/patterns.ndjson` updated if applicable.
- [ ] **Validation:** I have run `python .github/validate_entries.py` locally and it passes.
- [ ] **Sources:** All URLs are valid and point to credible public documentation.
- [ ] **Aesthetics:** Markdown is clean, headers are consistent, and Mermaid diagrams render correctly.

## Severity Assessment (for new entries)

- **Level:** [Critical | High | Medium | Low]
- **Rationale:** Why was this severity level chosen?
